remarks: A restricted topological space is a topological space.  Note that this theorem would not be true if ` TopSp ` was defined directly in terms of the ` TopSet ` slot instead of the ` TopOpen ` derived function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
statement: resstps $p |- ( ( K e. TopSp /\ A e. V ) -> ( K |`s A ) e. TopSp ) $.
